title: Don Tattaunawa da Tawagar
subtitle: Ƙungiyar Usul tana ƙunshe da injiniyoyi, masu zane, da masu bincike waɗanda ke da sha'awar gina kayan aikin dijital don sauya binciken Musulunci.
board-subtitle: Usul aikin Seemore Foundation ne, wanda kwamitinsa ya ƙunshi kwararrun masana bincike da fasaha, kowanne yana da shekaru masu yawa na ƙwarewa a fannin su. Tare, suna sa ido kan ƙungiyar kuma suna tabbatar da cewa tana cimma manufarta.

adnan-zulfiqar.name: Adnan Zulfiqar
adnan-zulfiqar.description: Adnan ya ƙware a Shari'ar Musulunci da laifuffuka. Ya rubuta dokokin laifi ga Maldives da Somalia.

intisar-rabb.name: Intisar Rabb
intisar-rabb.description: Intisar farfesa ce ta doka a Jami'ar Harvard. Ita ce shugabar SHARIAsource da Shirin Dokar Musulunci.

zeki-mokhtarzada.name: Zeki Mokhtarzada
zeki-mokhtarzada.description: Zeki ɗan kasuwa ne mai ƙwarewa a fannin fasaha sosai. Ya kafa Freewebs da Truebill tare da wasu.

anas-hassanien.name: Anas Hassanien
anas-hassanien.description: Anas tsohon injiniyan software ne a Simli AI. Shi ke jagorantar ci gaban manyan kayayyakin mu.

abtsam-saleh.name: Abtsam Saleh
abtsam-saleh.description: Abtsam ɗalibi ne na digiri na uku a Nazarin Addini tare da fannin kimiyyar bayanai.

ryad-ramo.name: Ryad Ramo
ryad-ramo.description: Ryad manazarta ne wanda ya ƙware a fannin ilimin Musulunci da tarihin Musulunci. Yana da digiri na farko a fannin Nazarin Musulunci kuma shi ne wanda ya kafa Gems of Al-Andalus.

ahmed-aktan.name: Ahmet Aktan
ahmed-aktan.description: Ahmed yana da digirin digirgir daga Jami'ar Al-Azhar. Shi ne ke jagorantar ƙungiyar da kuma ƙoƙarin canza bayanai zuwa dijital.

ismail-safadi.name: Ismail Safadi
ismail-safadi.description: Ismail ƙwararre ne a fannin fiqhun Hanafi. Ya yi karatu a Jami'ar Jordan da kuma a Turkiyya.

abdellatif-abdelfattah.name: Abdellatif Abdelfattah
abdellatif-abdelfattah.description: Abdellatif ya kafa Tarteel AI tare, ya jagoranci injiniya a Quran.com, kuma ya yi aiki a Twitter.

ahmed-riad.name: Ahmed Riad
ahmed-riad.description: Ahmed ya kafa Remail AI, Betterbook, kuma ya kasance injiniya a Quran.com.

mohamed-lamine.name: Mohamed Lamine
mohamed-lamine.description: Mohamed ya kasance jagoran zane a Thmanyah, yana ba da shawara ga farawa don ƙirƙirar samfura daga 0 zuwa 1.

rahma-fateen.name: Rahma Fateen
rahma-fateen.description: Rahma ta jagoranci fassarar Larabci a Tarteel AI. Tsohuwar fassara ce a Human Rights Watch.

ahmed-khan.name: Ahmed Khan
ahmed-khan.description: Ahmed ɗalibi ne a Kwalejin Zaytuna. Shi ne mahaliccin kwasfan fayiloli na The Creative Minority.
